item.title: Bulby: Pickup and MasterBank commands
item.dc:creator: @xmath279 xmath279
item.description:
@xmath279 wrote:

I’d like to make a Pickup and Masterbank command (to show another player’s bank).

Here is where I am with the pickup. I have no clue for the masterbank.

if (cmd[0].startsWith("pickup")) {
                        String[] args = cmd[0].split(" " + 1);
                        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
                        int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
                        if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                                Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, newItemID, newItemAmount);  
                        } else {
                                p.frames.sendMessage(p, "No such item.");
                        }
            }

Read full topic
